Key Match Events: India registered a hard-fought win to take a 2-1 lead in the series
Shubman Gill’s measured fifty was the driving force behind India’s competitive 182 for four against Zimbabwe
Washington Sundar was the pick of India bowlers, returning 3/15 in his 4-over spell
Clive Madande’s maiden international fifty went in vain as Zimbabwe fell 24 runs short in the chase of 183
Miscellaneous Highlights: The action will resume this weekend in Harare
